message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this amazing product for $95. I believe it's a great value considering its worth to you. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate it. I would like to propose a price of $85 for the product. I hope this is within your consideration.

Bob, thanks for the counteroffer. I understand your perspective, but I'm still hoping to get a little closer to my desired price. How about $90? I believe it's still a great deal for you, considering the value of the product.
I appreciate your response, Alice. Considering the value of the product to me, I would like to propose a price of $87 for the product. I hope this is a price you can consider.
